title: Polygon
description: A polygon, which is a closed figure on the surface of the Earth.

show.description: Whether or not the polygon is shown.

positions.description: The array of positions defining a simple polygon.

holes.description: The array of arrays of positions defining holes in the polygon.

arcType.description: The type of arc that should connect the positions of the polygon.

height.description: The height of the polygon when `perPositionHeight` is false.

heightReference.description: The height reference of the polygon, which indicates if `height` is relative to terrain or not.

extrudedHeight.description: The extruded height of the polygon.

extrudedHeightReference.description: The extruded height reference of the polygon, which indicates if `extrudedHeight` is relative to terrain or not.

stRotation.description: The rotation of any applied texture. A positive rotation is counter-clockwise.

fill.description: Whether or not the polygon is filled.

material.description: The material to use to fill the polygon.

outline.description: Whether or not the polygon is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the polygon outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the polygon outline.

perPositionHeight.description: Whether to use the height of each position to define the polygon or to use `height` as a constant height above the surface.

closeTop.description: Whether to close the top of the polygon.

closeBottom.description: Whether to close the bottom of the polygon.

shadows.description: Whether or not the polygon casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying the distance from the camera at which this polygon will be displayed.

classificationType.description: Whether a classification affects terrain, 3D Tiles, or both.

zIndex.description: The z-index of the polygon, used for ordering ground geometry. Only has an effect if the polygon is constant, and `height` and `extrudedHeight` are not specified.
